[spoiler="GIF"][img]http://g.recordit.co/VO4Crk4PTh.gif[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9SrRe/e5d59c9377.gif[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9SrZu/0656307b00.gif%5D[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/9Ss8Z/fb760823a6.gif[/img][/spoiler]
[spoiler="List of Features"] 100+ Daily Players Great economy Daily events Up to 8 game modes One of a kind gambling system [fully scam-proof] Unique duo slayer system Flawless Grand Exchange More than 200 achievements to complete 21 skills to train and receive cash for doing so Weekly lottery Unique teleport system Over 30 bosses to defeat Boss pets Top of the line account security Every single familiar special functioning perfectly Barrows spin off from the popular "hill barrows" and akriseae [the 7th barrows brother] Challenge players near home to a friendly duel Flawless staking with updated functions Fully working bank system [includes pins, searching, 100% bank tabs, etc] Great clan chat system Custom (non-tacky) items Impetuous Impulses Rewards for voting which can give up to party hats! Double XP weekends + LOTS MORE! [/spoiler] [/center]
Huge credits to Zeyntra for the amazing thread layout image
The title is a joke for those who will attempt to post something about that lol

item.title: ☆ Runique ☆ #2 RSPS Since 2001 ☆ Much Unique ☆
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

Thanks for the friendly replies

Construction Beta testing has now begun on Runique!

We have decided to implement it on our live server. While construction is under Beta you will not need any items, levels, etc. to build. How ever you will not receive any experience. The purpose of this release is for bug testing

Warning - Construction is still buggy as it is under Beta testing.

Read full topic

item.title: ☆ Runique ☆ #2 RSPS Since 2001 ☆ Much Unique ☆
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

We have had a lot of ups and downs for the past week but we are making a steady recovery and still have future plans for the server.

In other news…

Bump:

Relex has continued working on Construction and we hope to have the beta testing within a weeks time. Beta testing will be on the live server without XP drops and level requirements being available. You will how ever be able to see the amount of experience you should have gotten and the items needed to create objects in construction!

We are planning on hopefully releasing our new homepage early next month and have voting back up and running!

It’s been an interesting week, but we still have future plans for Runique!

Read full topic

item.title: ☆ Runique ☆ #2 RSPS Since 2001 ☆ Much Unique ☆
item.dc:creator: @adman189 adman189
item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

Hit a new peak today (was actually 461, but didn’t get a screenshot of it):

Latest work on construction:

Was stuck on making an algorithm yesterday to find where new rooms are being created (when you click on build in a door hotspot). Finally figured it out today so here's a basic overview of the past 2 days: 
Features:


- Grid size depending on your construction level (meaning when map area is 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 or 7x7)
- Limit on how many rooms you can have depends on your construction level
- The room creation interface is fully complete
- You can now create rooms by right-clicking on the door hotspots
- Upon creating a new room, your location is saved and you're not moved back to the portal location once the new room is built (if you saw the previous gif update you would know what this means :P)
- The room creation finds coins in your pouch if you have more in your pouch then in your inventory (so if you have 100k in your inventory and 5m in your money pouch and a room costs 500k to create, you will still be able to create it and see the coin text stay green)
- The room direction when creating it is based upon the direction you make it from (if you make a room when your played faces the east-side, the room's rotation will match it respectively)


Media: (This is just a basic overview, haven't shown all features)


[url=http://recordit.co/LvqBPmMxla]Recordit: Record screencasts fast & free! with GIF Support![/url]</blockquote>

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @relexlawl relexlawl
item.description:
@relexlawl wrote:

We hit over 400 players today!

In other news, here are some progress updates on construction:

Update (06/21/2015):

All’s good on the support to ‘build’ your rooms, used a dialogue to test so now I am working on the actual interface which is coming along quite nicely at the time (it’s still currently in progress)

Room creation support

Recordit: Record screencasts fast & free! with GIF Support!

Room creation interface

item.description:
@adman189 wrote:

[QUOTE=RS_WHISKEY;14725565]what kinda server is it? 718, 377? what[/QUOTE]

It’s a 317

Bump for Runique

We have managed to hit over 240+ players on Runique!

Relex has been doing an amazing job at bringing in new content and client/server updates/fixes

Here is a list of the most recent updates that he has done over the past week or so.

(Warning: It’s quite a lot )
